DOC.brief_title: A Study Of PF-05190457 In Healthy Volunteers And Type-2 Diabetic Patients

Type 2 diabetic male female nonchildbearing potential age 18 55 year , BMI 18.5 40.0 kg/m^2 , weight 50 150 kg , HbA1c 7.010.0 % , inclusive .
